attributes.action: Introduce PMs to have mandatory meetings with innovative leaders.
attributes.additional_details: It could aid the progression of technology make the country in a better postion to deal with change and bring better health care to the public through innovation and the suppourt of the prime minster on a mandatory basis these things would be achived faster. Exsposure to change makes mistakes easliy observable and thefore change is achived faster we learns faster as a society , innovation is the start and the future of an era that embraces change.
attributes.background: It is my belief  that if this was discussed hopefully a bill could be passed that allows prime minsters to aid progression of technology and by this mandatory meeting technology can be advanced through initiative, preparation and innovation.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Your petition calls on the Prime Minister to regularly meet with "innovative leaders", but we're not sure what you mean by this.
